Data: 9:30am Australia have won the toss and they will bat.
Taylor to Marsh, no run fullish ball, almost a yorker, but wide enough to drive to point
Taylor to Marsh, no run fullish again and he pushes that across to the on-side
Taylor to Marsh, 3 runs there's runs now as he takes a full ball from about off stump and turns it past Benn at midwicket, whi runs after it and cuts it down near the boundary
Taylor to Watson, no run yorker-length delivery and Watson just pushes it back to Taylor
Taylor to Watson, no run some outswing for Taylor now as he lands that one of a full length and Watson leaves it be

Taylor to Watson, OUT and now there's a wicket, a big one too, to cap what could be the longest first over ever! Taylor pitches very full and angles the ball in through the air, Watson expects it to move away and doesn't get his front foot out too much but the ball dips and clips him flush on the foot
Powell to Marsh, no run good length outside off, swings in very close as Marsh opts to leave
Powell to Marsh, no run now he pitches it wider and moves it away from Marsh, who cannot stop having a flirt and very nearly edges it to Browne, the wicketkeeper
Powell to Marsh, no run movement again, and some bounce, as Marsh allows that one pass
Powell to Marsh, 1 run pitches on leg and straightens and Marsh pushes it back past Ponting, calling for the run as he takes on to the danger end, mid-off running in fast
Powell to Ponting, no run and he leaves first ball, planting his front foot well in and raising arms
Powell to Ponting, no run fuller ball, much fuller, and he drives it to cover, who is sharp to stop it
Taylor to Marsh, no run full with movement through the air, pitches on off and turned to midwicket by Marsh, getting the bat down in time
Taylor to Marsh, no run not as full and a bit wider, still swinging though, and Marsh leaves
Taylor to Marsh, 1 run close one, as Marsh pushes at another swinging fuller delivery and gets an inside-edge onto front pad before Ponting calls for the single to square leg
Taylor to Ponting, no run good ball, pitching on middle and off and straightening and Ponting, inching across his stumps, has to defend that back to Taylor
Taylor to Ponting, FOUR runs but thats too straight and in Ponting's area, so he gets off the mark with a pleasing clip off the pads and the fast outfield does the rest
Taylor to Ponting, no run good comeback delivery, on a length and he gets forward to defend
Powell to Marsh, no run angled across Marsh, with swing and lift, and he shoulders arms
Powell to Marsh, no run short of a length, again with lovely carry to Browne, and Marsh leaves
Powell to Marsh, 2 runs very full outside off stump and he squeezes it past gully for a couple
Powell to Marsh, no run top delivery! Thats a good length, with seam and lift, to beat Marsh as he pushes forward and misses by a whisker, Browne takes it up at a good height too
Powell to Marsh, no run back of a length and seaming away and Marsh allows this to go by
Powell to Marsh, no run tries to get the yorker right and Marsh punches straight to cover
Taylor to Ponting, 3 runs some movement through the air but fraction too full and Ponting pushes that off the front foot and picks the gap wide of Benn at extra cover, running hard
Taylor to Marsh, FOUR runs dragged in short and he's hurried into the shot, but plays it well and makes sure to keep it along the ground, tucking the ball into the gap at square leg
Taylor to Marsh, no run full now and he drives it across towards mid-on, who runs in
Taylor to Marsh, no run back of a length and wide, but it swings back in so Marsh leaves it be
Taylor to Marsh, no run moves away this time but its wide enough for Marsh to leave again
Taylor to Marsh, 1 run swings in and he clips that from off stump, in the air wide of midwicket
Powell to Marsh, OUT edged and taken! Powell bowls it short of a length and Marsh, trying to steer it down to third man, doesn't get over the bounce and tickles it to Browne, silly shot that
Powell to Clarke, 1 run short of a length and he defends it to backward point, calling for one as Ponting hesitates but they end up running through for the single
Powell to Ponting, no run lands it on a good length, Ponting strides in and shoulders arms
Powell to Ponting, no run good length outside off and he leaves it be this time as well
Powell to Ponting, FOUR runs full and wide, Ponting drives but mistimes it, scooping it over Bravo's fingers at backward point and thats his second boundary of the morning, albeit streakily
Powell to Ponting, no run better length and he drives it back to Powell, who feigns a throw back
Taylor to Clarke, no run good length on middle and off and Clarke patiently defends it back
Taylor to Clarke, no run back of a length, slightly wider, and he opts to leave that alone
Taylor to Clarke, no run shorter one outside off, he gets up and pushes it backward point
Taylor to Clarke, no run short again and he gets onto the toes, punching to cover this time
Taylor to Clarke, no run tidy line from Taylor gets Clarke defending again, telling Ponting to wait
Taylor to Clarke, no run invites the drive but he gets forward and leaves, ending a maiden over

Powell to Ponting, no run yowza! That one's full and swinging in exaggeratedly off the pitch, producing a loose drive from Ponting and the ball nips back between bat and pad and Browne has to fling himself around to stop the ball from carrying on further
Powell to Ponting, 1 run too full and on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg for one
Powell to Clarke, no run good length again, pitching and straightening, and Clarke leaves
Powell to Clarke, no run gets a massive stride in and defends that one to the man at cover
Powell to Clarke, FOUR runs top shot, Clarke just planting his front foot forward and putting the half-volley away past extra cover
Powell to Clarke, FOUR runs two in two, this one punched straight back past the stumps and some sloppy fielding on the boundary down there gives away the four
Taylor to Ponting, no run change of pace, landing on a full length and straightening away to beat Ponting's bat as he defends off the front foot
Taylor to Ponting, no run this time he gets more forward and defends a good ball to cover
Taylor to Ponting, no run full this time as he looks for swing but wide enough for Ponting to leave
Taylor to Ponting, 1 run short on the stumps and Ponting hooks in the air but it drops before the man down near the ropes at fine leg
Taylor to Clarke, 1 run lands on a length wide of off stump and Clarke pushes away from his body, playing it wide of the lone slip and backward point for a single

Taylor to Ponting, OUT caught! Slower ball works as Ponting shuffles across and clips this in the air, indifferently, lazily, straight to Gayle at short midwicket, who falls to his right and clutches on
Powell to Clarke, no run comes back in sharply, Clarke gets tall and lets the ball sails over the stumps
Powell to Clarke, no run good ball, short of a length and Clarke shoulders arms to it that time
Powell to Clarke, no run a touch fuller and straighter and he drives to mid-off, who slides and saves it
Powell to Clarke, no run short of a length and he gets up again, defending it down to point
Powell to Clarke, no run slower ball, fuller length and that one's clipped to short midwicket
Powell to Clarke, no run good length ball draws a defensive shot to cover, ending a maiden over
Taylor to Hussey, no run gets him shouldering arms first ball with one short of a good length
Taylor to Hussey, no run full this time, moving through the air and he punches it to cover-point
Taylor to Hussey, no run lands on middle and straightens and Hussey taps it back to Taylor
Taylor to Hussey, no run now he draws him forward with one outside off, stopped by Bravo
Taylor to Hussey, no run slower ball, wider and inviting the drive but Hussey, nearly playing, leaves
Taylor to Hussey, no run second maiden in a row, Hussey leaving a wide one be off the front foot
Powell to Clarke, no run back of a length and he shoulder arms as the ball starts to lift
Powell to Clarke, no run pitches in line and comes in, Clarke shuffles and drives to midwicket
Powell to Clarke, no run bowls a tempting fullish one outside off and Clarke shoulders arms
Powell to Clarke, no run nips back in very sharply and pings him on the inside of the thigh, that will leave a bruise or red spot for a while
Powell to Clarke, no run straighter one and Clarke gets forward to defend it back
Powell to Clarke, no run this one comes in and Clarke turns it to the fielder at midwicket
Bravo to Hussey, no run works it across Hussey, back of a length, and he watches it go past
Bravo to Hussey, no run short of a length and he defends with an inside-edge onto his boot
Bravo to Hussey, no run straighter one, change of pace, and defended back to Bravo
Bravo to Hussey, no run thats full and angled across Hussey, who leaves it be for Browne
Bravo to Hussey, no run even fuller and Hussey defends solidly off the front foot to cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run pushes at one seaming across off a shorter length and gets beaten
Powell to Clarke, no run straighter one on the stumps, Clarke falls across and drives to mid-on
Powell to Clarke, 1 run now there's a single, with Clarke getting on top of the bounce and pushing into the covers, where a sliding stop can't cut off the quick run
Powell to Hussey, no run short one, lifting off the track as it angles across Hussey, who watches it
Powell to Hussey, no run follows up with a fuller one, firmly driven off the front foot to cover

Powell to Hussey, 1 run hustles his first run to get off the mark after 15 deliveries, cramped by a short one that cuts back in but he gets bat on it and drops the ball near the slips, Clarke calls him down for the single

Powell to Clarke, no run another one short of a length, jagging back in, is loosely played to point off the thigh as Clarke falls over and misses out on the shot, Powell has a smile and a word of advice
Bravo to Hussey, no run full and going away, he chases it with a drive and inside-edges onto pad
Bravo to Hussey, no run gets forward and leaves that one, Bravo bowling a top-class line here
Bravo to Hussey, no run leaves off the front foot again, the ball swinging away from off stump
Bravo to Hussey, no run its like a Test match, Hussey patiently defending a good ball to cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run uses his feet this time but can only defend the ball as Bravo spots him coming and alters the length, top stuff this
Bravo to Hussey, no run ends a good over with one back of a length and its defended well
Powell to Clarke, no run gets onto the back foot and punches the ball to an ambidextrous Marshall in the covers, who dives to one side and releases with the other hand
Powell to Clarke, no run super ball, nipping back in through the gap between bat and body, nearly cutting Clarke in half and there's noise but its ball brushing thigh through to Browne
Powell to Clarke, 1 run too straight on this occasion and he's sharp to on-drive a quick single
Powell to Hussey, no run short of a length and Hussey steers this one to backward point
Powell to Hussey, no run good ball, lands outside leg and seams across and Hussey defends
Powell to Hussey, no run good ball again, this time Hussey defends getting back
Bravo to Clarke, no run swings in off a length and Clarke defends to Marshall at short cover
Bravo to Clarke, no run shorter and he quickly gets back, punching to short cover again
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run gets back and drops this one to backward point, Hussey initiates the manic single from the other end, Clarke sets off and the fielder misses the stumps
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run now he plays a shot, getting over one angled across and steering into the gap between the slips and backward point for a single
Bravo to Clarke, no run uses his feet and drives handsomely but can't beat a moving mid-off
Bravo to Clarke, no run gets back in his crease and tries to softly steal another single towards backward point but Chanderpaul swoops in rapidly to cut off any such thoughts
Sammy to Hussey, no run starts off with a short one, which Hussey tucks to midwicket
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run short again and Hussey places a poor pull shot, ball taking the splice of the bat very high and nearly lobbing to mid-on, but he's slow to react and the ball lands safe
Sammy to Clarke, no run no pace but a tidier line, back of a length, and Clarke shuffles to defend
Sammy to Clarke, no run comes well down the track and defends a shorter one from Sammy
Sammy to Clarke, no run sees some room but can only get up and chop the ball to point
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run steals a single last ball, using his feet and pushing back past the stumps
Bravo to Clarke, no run fuller ball outside off, swings in, Clarke pushes to short cover
Bravo to Clarke, no run swings through the air and lands full, Clarke gets in and on-drives
Bravo to Clarke, no run gets onto the front foot and drives again, failing to beat short cover
Bravo to Clarke, no run moves forward and punches the ball to cover, who also stops it
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run thats too wide and he cuts over the ball, getting a single out to Powell running across from third man, who returns a good throw to keep them to one
Bravo to Hussey, no run worked across him at a good height and he watches it go to Browne
Sammy to Clarke, no run gets onto the front foot and plays a pleasing drive, but right to cover
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run single now, but courtesy an inside-edge to square leg as he defends
Sammy to Hussey, no run change of pace, good length on off stump and he plods it back
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run good shot, getting over the bounce and guiding a single to third man
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run too straight and he turns that into the gap at square leg
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run fullish ball outside off stump and he drives well to extra cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run short of a length, no room to work with, and he defends off the back foot
Bravo to Hussey, no run plays and misses at one that kicks up and he admonishes himself
Bravo to Hussey, no run now he comes down the pitch, smothering the ball to cover
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run advances down and drives into the gap at cover, single out to sweeper
Bravo to Clarke, 1 wide walks way across his stumps to the off side, Bravo sees him and drags it in short, and umpire Asad Rauf spreads his arms
Bravo to Clarke, 1 wide another wide, this one sliding down leg stump, raises 50 in the 21st over
Bravo to Clarke, no run shuffles across and on-drives, but Bravo reacts and saves a single
Bravo to Clarke, no run nearly pops a return catch back to Bravo as this one stops on him, Clarke plays with one hand off the bat but the ball drops to the right of Bravo
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run there's a single as the ball strays and Hussey nudges to square leg
Sammy to Clarke, no run gentle stuff, no real movement, and he defends off the front foot
Sammy to Clarke, no run gets forward, well outside his crease, and drives a slow ball to mid-off
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run shuffles around and nudges a straighter one down to fine leg
Sammy to Hussey, no run this one seams across and beats bat as he pokes at it away from his body, the most gentle bit of movement off the scrambled seam does the trick that time .. well, almost
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run bit too full and Hussey comes forward to drive towards extra cover
Bravo to Hussey, no run pushed across the stumps and he leaves it be
Bravo to Hussey, no run fuller and wider and he again leaves it be for Browne
Bravo to Hussey, 2 runs short and he pulls past midwicket, wanting two immediately
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run picks up one more, dabbing a wide one past backward point
Bravo to Clarke, no run good length on middle and off, straightens, Clarke drives it back
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run eases onto the front foot, pushes a single to a sluggish Gayle at cover
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run gets back and across and on-drives off the toes to Marshall at mid-on
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run gets up and steers a short one past backward point for one more
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run a bit too wide and now its Clarke's turn to dab the ball to third man
Sammy to Hussey, no run good length ball on off stump, Hussey drops his head and defends
Sammy to Hussey, no run gets forward and blocks this one out as well, in no hurry at all
Sammy to Hussey, no run tidy stuff again, landing on middle and leg and watchfully patted back
Bravo to Clarke, no run bounced in short and he misses out on the pull, pirouetting, plays too early
Bravo to Clarke, no run fuller and straighter, bunted back but Bravo dives across to field
Bravo to Clarke, no run well played, working the shorter one across the line, but to the fielder
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run swings in and he clips it nicely past midwicket to Taylor
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run short, wide and crunched away off the back foot to deep point
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run fuller and straighter and he drives it towards mid-on to keep strike
Sammy to Clarke, no run short and it sits up and he plays an uppercut, getting airborne, but the tennis-ball bounce defeats him
Sammy to Clarke, FOUR runs a boundary .. bring out the drums! Clarke sashays down and thumps this one over Sammy to long-off ... thats been about 101 balls since the last four
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run short and wide and he gets across, cutting into the covers
Sammy to Hussey, no run full on middle and off and he pushes the ball to cover
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run no room to work with but he pushes this one to point, well done
Sammy to Clarke, no run defends the last ball back to Sammy patiently
Pollard to Hussey, no run good start, he pitches it on line and it moves away off the pitch, beating Hussey's edge
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run outside off again, this time Hussey waits and guides it through the vacant slip region for a single
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run a bit of bounce for Pollard, but at his pace Clarke has no problem pushing it away to off for a single
Pollard to Hussey, no run defended away to cover
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run Hussey waits again and helps it on its way down to third man
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run and now Clarke does the same thing, outside off and he angles the bat to guide it fine for an easy single
Benn to Clarke, no run he's around the wicket with one slip, Clarke cuts to point
Benn to Clarke, no run bit of turn now, past the outside edge, good bowling
Benn to Clarke, no run Clarke pushes this one away to cover
Benn to Clarke, no run Clarke forward now, smothers any spin and pushes back to the bowler
Benn to Clarke, no run no real turn on this one, Benn tosses it up outside off and Clarke defends

Benn to Clarke, FOUR runs and there's a big chance that's gone begging! Benn did get this one to turn, pitching outside off and spinning further away, Clarke tries to cut but gets an edge to first slip. Bravo has moved to his right and the ball went to his left, he didn't even get a hand on it, but really that should have been a comfortable catch, he just moved the wrong way
Pollard to Hussey, no run defended away to point
Pollard to Hussey, FOUR runs good shot, Hussey's first boundary as he seizes on a short one from the medium-pacer and pulls confidently forward of midwicket.
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run driven away to deep cover and there's an easy run
Pollard to Clarke, no run pushed away defensively
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run on off stump, good line and Clarke nudges it away forward of point
Pollard to Hussey, 1 run cut fine, there's more easy singles to third man
Benn to Hussey, no run spins in to the stumps, Hussey defends
Benn to Hussey, no run Hussey pushes away to cover and there's no run
Benn to Hussey, 5 wide this one spins and bounces too much, it's darted down leg side and Browne can't glove it, the ball runs away to the boundary
Benn to Hussey, no run Hussey leaves outside off
Benn to Hussey, 1 run turns in towards off, Hussey tucks it away square
Benn to Clarke, 1 run Benn curves this one in towards the stumps, Clarke uses his feet and drives down to long on
Benn to Hussey, 1 run just a little spin, Hussey turns it to square leg and they scamper through for a tight single
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run darted in, Hussey pushes a quick single towards point
Gayle to Clarke, 2 runs tossed up a fraction, Clarke tries a big swat and edgily gets it away behind square, not where he intended
Gayle to Clarke, no run flatter and wider outside off, Clarke cuts but there's a short third man who stops any run
Gayle to Clarke, no run turns in to Clarke, who defends
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run on the stumps, Clarke gets down for a paddle sweep that is collected at fine leg
Gayle to Hussey, no run angled in to Hussey, who defends
Benn to Clarke, no run straight ball, Clarke defends
Benn to Clarke, 1 run pushed away to deep cover and there's an easy single
Benn to Hussey, no run pitches around off stump and turns down leg, Hussey tries to glance and doesn't connect, then wonders why it wasn't called a wide, which is a good question
Benn to Hussey, 1 run nudged away to point for a quick run
Benn to Clarke, no run prods this one away to cover
Benn to Clarke, FOUR runs and Clarke attacks now, Benn pitches wide of off, Clarke gets forward and sweeps along the ground through midwicket, a good safe shot that gets the scoreboard ticking over
Gayle to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to reverse sweep, doesn't connect and the ball strikes him on the pad, it was heading down leg though
Gayle to Hussey, no run pushed away to leg
Gayle to Hussey, no run defends on the front foot
Gayle to Hussey, 2 runs this time Hussey's reverse sweep does work, he gets it fine for a couple
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run pushed away for a quick single into the off side

Gayle to Clarke, FOUR runs very good shot from Clarke, Gayle pushing them through a tad quickly and Clarke waits, then with very soft hands cuts it so fine that it would have gone between the keeper and first slip, not that there was a slip, and it runs away for four. Excellent thinking from Clarke
Benn to Hussey, 1 run turns toward Hussey's pads now, he works it away through square leg
Benn to Clarke, 1 run Clarke rocks back now and cuts square, Benn just a fraction too short that time
Benn to Hussey, no run quite a bit of turn in towards Hussey, he tries to tuck it away fine but can't get a run
Benn to Hussey, 1 run pushed out forward of point this time
Benn to Clarke, 1 run on the pads, Clarke nudges an easy single to long on and that's his half-century
Benn to Hussey, 1 run pushed away into the off side, easy runs for Australia here and West Indies just can't build up the pressure
Gayle to Hussey, no run nudged away towards cover
Gayle to Hussey, no run there's some turn, Hussey tries to sweep and can't connect
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run spins it away from Hussey again, but no real drift from Gayle and Hussey works a run forward of point
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run cut away to point and there's an easy single where there probably shouldn't have been one
Gayle to Hussey, 2 runs guided away forward of point, they push through for two and West Indies are not switched on in the field here, that should have been kept to one
Gayle to Hussey, 1 wide down leg side, Hussey can't get bat on ball and Asad Rauf, after a long while to make his decision, calls it wide
Gayle to Hussey, no run another reverse sweep doesn't come off for Hussey, hit on the pads but Gayle's angle is taking it down leg side
Benn to Clarke, 1 run Clarke uses his feet and gets to the pitch of the ball, clipping a run to long on
Benn to Hussey, 1 run Hussey sweeps, beats Chanderpaul at square leg and gets a single into the deep
Benn to Clarke, no run pushed to cover
Benn to Clarke, no run an appeal for lbw, Clarke tried to sweep but couldn't connect, the ball clearly spinning past off stump
Benn to Clarke, 1 run another easy single, Clarke just finding the gaps so comfortably here
Benn to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off, Hussey drives hard but straight to cover
Bravo to White, no run well bowled, a spot-on yorker on middle and off, slower too, has White jamming the bat down just in time and Bravo fields himself
Bravo to White, 1 run not quite right this time and White clips off the pads to midwicket
Bravo to Hopes, 1 run well done again, yorker on off stump, he jams bat down and the ball sneaks through this legs for a scampered single towards square leg
Bravo to White, 1 run very full outside off stump and thats driven out to deep cover sweeper
Bravo to Hopes, 1 run full on off stump and turned away off the front pad to deep midwicket
Bravo to White, 1 run nearly a yorker but not quite, yet its only a driven single to mid-on
Taylor to White, (no ball) 2 runs poor stuff, a front-foot no-ball, and he gives White room to cut past point
Taylor to White, 2 runs gives him more room, White cuts up and over point, not timed well and Pollard does well to run across in front of square and keep them to two
Taylor to White, FOUR runs powerful shot, White makes room and muscles this very straight and a sliding long-on cannot get there, that shot came up because of the length Taylor bowled

Taylor to White, 1 run good grief, Fletcher's dropped him at deep square leg! White went hooking a short ball, undone by the sluggish bounce, but Taylor is let down by his fielder, keeping his eyes on it but not settling himself and spilling a simple catch, in and out
Taylor to Hopes, 1 run short again and this one's worked along the ground to Fletcher
Taylor to White, 1 run onto the front foot, slashing through the covers for one
Taylor to Hopes, 1 run short on the stumps and he pulls over the man at midwicket, the slowness of the track not allowing the ball to come on, and the sweeper runs in to field
Powell to Clarke, 1 run tip and run from Clarke, he nudges to cover and takes off immediately, Bravo's throw to the bowler's end missed but Clarke was home in any case
Powell to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball, Hussey forward and driving through cover, Hussey pushes for two and puts the pressure on the man in the deep, a fumble lets them get back
Powell to Hussey, 1 run pushed to midwicket for an easy run
Powell to Clarke, no run Clarke prods defensively back down the pitch
Powell to Clarke, 1 run angled in to the pads, Clarke clips it forward of square and despite another fumble in the deep from Bravo this time, they only get a single
Powell to Hussey, no run short ball, not a bad one from Powell, Hussey shapes to hook and then lets it go
Benn to Clarke, no run dropped! Clarke drives it back to Benn's left, he hurls the hand out in hope and it bounces out, really tough chance, those either stick or they don't.
Benn to Clarke, 1 run cut away for a single
Benn to Hussey, no run Hussey sweeps, can't beat the man behind square

Benn to Hussey, SIX runs tossed up outside off, Hussey picks this one up early and sweeps with the turn, it flies over deep midwicket and bounces just over the rope, Pollard dives in the deep but he was never really near that one. First six of the innings
Benn to Hussey, 1 run flatter this time from Benn, Hussey tucks a single square

Benn to Clarke, OUT and Benn breaks through! He's coming around the wicket, sends in a quicker ball that pitches on off, Clarke is walking across and trying to clip through leg, he's struck in line and that was not spinning, probably taking leg stump
Bravo to Hopes, 1 run makes room and skips down, Bravo knew he was coming and bowled it short and wide and Hopes swats it off the toe end of the bat down to mid-off
Bravo to White, 2 runs full and down leg stump as he sees White moving about, well bowled, so thats a clipped couple more to the score out to deep fine leg
Bravo to White, 1 bye slower ball, White swings with his eyes shut, fails to connect, and another silly fumble by Browne gives up a run ... he's had a poor day behind the stumps
Bravo to Hopes, no run oh well done Bravo, following Hopes and honing a yorker into the pads, causing him to fall over onto his knees as the ball takes him out, excellent bowling
Bravo to Hopes, 2 runs doesn't get it right this time and Hopes flicks two to deep fine leg
Bravo to Hopes, 2 runs well done, nearly a yorker on leg stump, clipped in the air over midwicket
Taylor to White, 1 run in the blockhole, nearly, and White swings it down to long-on

Taylor to Hopes, 1 wide drops in a bouncer with no pace on it at all, Hopes swats and misses and the umpire calls it wide as it misses his bat ... Taylor doesn't like the call, marginally above the head, but not enough to be called wide
Taylor to Hopes, 1 run swings hard again, doesn't get it out of the screws, but one to midwicket
Taylor to White, 1 run full and right up there, White heaves it along the ground to midwicket
Taylor to Hopes, 1 run slips out a loopy full toss which Hopes can't put away, flicked to the deep
Taylor to White, 1 run another drop! White backs away and slices a slower ball to Gayle at extra cover, who leaps up full stretch and gets fingers to it, failing to latch on
Taylor to Hopes, no run bouncer to end the over, Hopes backs away and flays at it, trying to uppercut it over gully but the ball beats him so Australia are kept to 213 for 5

13:30pm Australia lost early wickets, Clarke and Hussey then buckled down on a sluggish track to add exactly 100 in 29 overs. That sounds extremely dull yes, but with an inexperienced order to follow the senior duo opted to bat it out and keep wickets in hand. Both scored sapping half-centuries before West Indies struck back. White finished unbeaten on 40, unable to really smack the
Here comes the West Indies chase, it's Lee to open with two slips in place
Lee to Fletcher, 1 run a bit straighter this time, Fletcher pushes to midwicket and gets off the mark
Lee to Gayle, no run outside off and moving away a fraction, Gayle leaves
Lee to Gayle, no run probing outside off again, Gayle shapes to play and then gets the bat out of the way
Lee to Gayle, no run more work for Ronchi behind the stumps as Gayle leaves outside off
Lee to Gayle, no run left alone again, a hint of shape in to Gayle this time
Bracken to Fletcher, no run on line straight away, Fletcher defends
Bracken to Fletcher, no run outside off and Fletcher cuts very hard, but straight to backward point where Ponting does the fielding
Bracken to Fletcher, no run this one bounces a touch more, Fletcher drops the bottom hand off the handle and the ball lobs up off his gloves, drops a couple of metres in front of him
Bracken to Fletcher, no run defended on the front foot now
Bracken to Fletcher, no run a hint of inswing, Fletcher works it straight down into the turf
Bracken to Fletcher, 1 run tries to work one off his pads behind square, there's some debate amongst the batsmen whether to run but in the end they make it through
Lee to Fletcher, no run outside off stump, Fletcher thinks about playing and then leaves
Lee to Fletcher, no run this time he does play, some seam away though from Lee and it beats the edge of Fletcher's bat
Lee to Fletcher, no run oh, and beats the bat again, this one was even closer to the bat. He's moving it away just a fraction and Fletcher is drawn into the shot
Lee to Fletcher, no run good pace and bounce, this time Fletcher leaves

Lee to Fletcher, FOUR runs fuller ball this time, just outside off and Fletcher plays it really well, getting the full face of the bat on a well-timed off drive that races away between cover and mid off
Lee to Fletcher, no run probing outside off again, left alone
Bracken to Gayle, no run outside off stump and Gayle defends
Bracken to Gayle, no run watchfully defended again
Bracken to Gayle, 1 wide down leg side, Gayle tries to glance and can't connect, that's certainly a wide
Bracken to Gayle, no run Gayle solid in defence as Bracken goes back to the off stump line
Bracken to Gayle, no run pushed away towards point
Bracken to Gayle, no run straighter ball now, Gayle carefully nudges to leg
Bracken to Gayle, no run left alone outside off
Lee to Fletcher, no run turned away to leg
Lee to Fletcher, no run left alone outside off, some outswing there for Lee
Lee to Fletcher, no run pushed away to midwicket
Lee to Fletcher, 1 wide that is fast and short, but it's just a fraction too short and well over Fletcher's head, so it's a wide
Lee to Fletcher, no run oh, that's a very good ball, on a good length and moving away off the seam, Fletcher tries to drive and it beats is bat by what must have been millimetres
Lee to Fletcher, no run this time Fletcher tries to cut hard, and again it beats the bat
Lee to Fletcher, no run driven uppishly this time, it falls a couple of metres short of mid off
Bracken to Gayle, no run Gayle defends to cover, he's being understandably cautious
Bracken to Gayle, no run nudged away defensively to cover again, he's still not off the mark
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run a little wider this time, Gayle gets on the board with a late cut that runs away to third man

Bracken to Fletcher, no run oh dear, Fletcher almost gets himself run out in casual fashion like in the first ODI. He tucked it behind square and took off immediately, Gayle said no, and Fletcher slowly turned and strolled back, really not aware that a throw was coming in from square leg
Bracken to Fletcher, no run pushed away defensively
Bracken to Fletcher, no run extra bounce from Bracken, it surprises Fletcher, who gets the bottom hand off the bat and defends
Lee to Gayle, no run angled across Gayle, who leaves
Lee to Gayle, no run testing Gayle with a slightly fuller ball right on line, Gayle gets the bat down and defends
Lee to Gayle, no run another cracking ball from Lee. It's pitched on leg, seamed away from Gayle, who was really squared up and it beats the outside edge
Lee to Gayle, no run another one tests Gayle, it straightens a touch and there's some brave judgement from Gayle to leave that one
Lee to Gayle, FOUR runs and Gayle finally gets one he can go after. A little wide outside off, Gayle drives off the back foot through cover and it flies away in the air for four
Lee to Gayle, (no ball) 1 run fullish ball, Gayle drives to mid off and the next one will be a free hit as Lee has overstepped

Lee to Fletcher, FOUR runs and Fletcher makes good use of the free hit. Lee digs one in short outside off, Fletcher chases it with a not-very-pretty but highly effective slap that flies in the air between mid off and cover and away to the boundary
Johnson to Gayle, no run good pace immediately from Johnson, Gayle pushes it away to point
Johnson to Gayle, no run big shouts from Johnson and the Australians, Gayle wafts outside off and there may have been some sort of noise as it went through to Ronchi but Asad Rauf is not interested
Johnson to Gayle, no run left alone outside off now
Johnson to Gayle, FOUR runs what a powerful shot! Gayle picks up a half-volley from outside off and just slaps it over mid on, that's one bounce and over the boundary
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run fast ball outside off, Chanderpaul leaves
Lee to Fletcher, no run on the stumps now, Fletcher pushes away to square leg
Lee to Fletcher, no run slower ball this time, it's straight again and Fletcher defends
Lee to Fletcher, no run outside off, no real movement now and it's prodded back down the pitch
Lee to Fletcher, no run punched away defensively to cover
Lee to Fletcher, no run driven away to cover again, Fletcher playing Lee a bit better now
Lee to Fletcher, no run fast and outside off, Fletcher flashes the bat and it beats his outside edge, he may have half pulled out of the shot at the last minute as well
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run left alone outside off
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run tighter line now, Chanderpaul defends
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run extra bounce from Johnson, but it's wide enough that Chanderpaul can leave comfortably
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run Johnson drags this one too wide of off again, Chanderpaul leaves
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 wide strays down leg side this time, that's certainly a wide
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run on the stumps and defended
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run left alone outside off

Watson to Fletcher, 2 runs on the pads first up, Fletcher flicks it deliberately in the air and safely over midwicket, not timed well enough to get to the boundary and Chanderpaul, perhaps hampered by his calf problem, doesn't want a third
Watson to Fletcher, no run punched away to cover
Watson to Fletcher, FOUR runs too short from Watson, Fletcher quickly gets on the back foot and swivels a pull forward of square leg for a well-placed boundary
Watson to Fletcher, no run slower delivery from Watson, it's outside off so Fletcher just lets it go
Watson to Fletcher, no run this one tests Fletcher a bit more, it's perhaps a shade quicker and nipping in a touch, Fletcher manages to defend but it nearly got through him
Watson to Fletcher, no run this one whizzes past the edge as Fletcher tries to pull one that probably wasn't short enough
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run Chanderpaul angles the bat and defends to point
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 2 runs on the pads now and Chanderpaul clips it through midwicket to get off the mark
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run prodded away defensively to point
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run wide outside off, Chanderpaul looks to pull and can't connect
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run a little bit of inswing perhaps, or maybe just the angle from over the wicket, Chanderpaul leaves one that comes in and misses off stump by a few inches
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run solid in defence this time
Watson to Fletcher, no run outside off, no real movement and Fletcher defends
Watson to Fletcher, no run good line again, Fletcher tries to walk down the pitch a bit then checks and defends
Watson to Fletcher, 1 run Fletcher punches a drive wide of mid off, the fielder gets across to make a save but there's an easy single there
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run and Watson beats the bat, it's really just angled across him and Chanderpaul tries to push it to cover and can't make contact
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run left alone this time
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run Chanderpaul tries to cut, it doesn't bounce that much and his under-edge goes into the ground and through to Ronchi
Johnson to Fletcher, 1 wide and thats a wide well down leg as Johnson struggles for rhythm
Johnson to Fletcher, (no ball) much better delivery, right up there on the stumps, but he's overstepped, so we have another free hit ... what can Fletcher do with it this time?
Johnson to Fletcher, 1 run its pretty full and he makes room, carving to a diving Ponting at mid-off
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run good line, plugging away outside off and Chanders leaves it be
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run overpitched on off stump and he lazily flicks to midwicket
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run change of pace, pitches in line and straightens, tapped to midwicket
Johnson to Chanderpaul, FOUR runs there in the slot and he drives it through the gap between cover and mid-off, flowing shot on the up, pushing with an open faced
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run short and wide, asking for trouble, but the energetic and athletic Michael Clarke cuts off a hard slap at backward point
Watson to Fletcher, no run good stuff, bringing Fletcher onto the front foot, defending
Watson to Fletcher, 1 run straighter one, he gets across and mistimes the nudge, but into the gap
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run good length outside off, he opens the face and steers to point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run stands back and drives a length ball back to Watson's right
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run eases forward and pushes a fuller one to backward point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run back and across and defends a shorter one with an inside-edge
Hopes to Fletcher, no run gets it on a pretty good length and Fletcher defends to point
Hopes to Bravo, no run short of a length and he gets back and across to defend
Hopes to Bravo, no run nips in off a short length and he plays it across to midwicket
Hopes to Bravo, no run fuller in length and he again gets back and across to defend
Hopes to Bravo, no run now Bravo gets well forward and runs the ball to backward point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run short of a length, Chanders gets back and punches right to cover
Watson to Chanderpaul, 2 runs touch too short and he pulls from outside off stump, making sure to keep the ball low, and harries a couple as deep midwicket runs around
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run short again, this time a firm back-foot shot is intercepted at point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run fuller ball, he uses his feet and drives to cover, sending Bravo back
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run cramped for room, he chops the ball down to backward point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run shapes to get back and across and work the ball into the gap at midwicket, but the short ball length has him playing awkwardly to backward point again
Hopes to Bravo, no run well punched off the back foot, but he can't pierce backward point
Hopes to Bravo, no run straighter line and Bravo gets into position, defending back to Hopes
Hopes to Bravo, no run gets across and tries to flick this one away, but he misses out and gets rapped above the flap as the ball angles down
Hopes to Bravo, no run repeating the shot, he's late on it and pushes to short midwicket
Hopes to Bravo, no run tight bowling from Hopes, nipping it back and Bravo taps it down
Hopes to Bravo, 1 run opens his account by gently steering a wide one down to third man
Watson to Bravo, no run shuffles across and turns the ball past midwicket, there's some poor calling and responding, Bravo wanting the run and Chanderpaul hesitating
Watson to Bravo, no run again he tries to whip the ball across the line but this one's short and angling and and strikes him above the knee roll and below the midriff, above the stumps
Watson to Bravo, no run crafty change of pace, gets Bravo onto the front foot and defending
Watson to Bravo, no run drives a near yorker-length ball with a flourish to the man at mid-on
Watson to Bravo, no run there's the yorker, on off stump, and Bravo digs it out in time
Watson to Bravo, no run Watson changes the length and Bravo defends off the back foot
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run gets across and plays with soft hands, dabbing through gully
Hopes to Bravo, no run bouncer now, surprising Bravo as he shapes to come forward and across, but has to rear his head back out of the ball's way
Hopes to Bravo, no run good-length ball outside off, Bravo hops across and defends to point
Hopes to Bravo, 1 wide slides down leg stump, Bravo misses, Ronchi dives to collect
Hopes to Bravo, 1 run a bit too straight and it allows him to clip past midwicket
Hopes to Chanderpaul, no run full length just outside off stump and Chanders defends it back
Hopes to Chanderpaul, no run this one forces him onto the back foot and he eases it to point
Watson to Bravo, 1 run well played, tucking the ball with the angle down to fine leg
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run short and he cuts well but on the bounce to Clarke at point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run full and he swings agriculturally across the line to midwicket
Watson to Chanderpaul, 1 run overpitched, fractionally, and he squeezes it past cover and point
Watson to Browne, no run short of a length and he gets back into line and defends
Hopes to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward and square-drives a loopy delivery to point
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run too straight and Chanders picks it off for a single to square leg
Hopes to Browne, no run good ball, pinning him back in his crease, defending
Hopes to Browne, no run beaten on the forward defensive, that ball straightening well
Hopes to Browne, no run onto the front foot again, this time pushing towards the off
Hopes to Browne, no run back of a length and Browne defends it patiently as pressure builds
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run low looping full toss, clipped across to midwicket for one
Clarke to Browne, no run quicker, flatter, sliding down leg and he gets an inside-edge
Clarke to Browne, no run drifts in again and Browne defends poorly, bat coming down late

Clarke to Browne, no run good delivery, this one spinning away and clipping something before nestling in Ronchi's gloves, they all ask the question but the umpire is unmoved ... I need to see a replay of that
Clarke to Browne, no run defended back to Clarke, nervously
Clarke to Browne, 1 run full and flat, worked into the gap for one
Hopes to Browne, no run back and across, shapes to work it across but it late on the shot
Hopes to Browne, no run tucked up again, he gets bat on it but mistimes it completely
Hopes to Browne, no run back and across this time, pushing the short one to point
Hopes to Browne, no run straighter one, middle and off, he gets back and defends
Hopes to Browne, no run no footwork at all, just pushing from the crease, inside-edge that time
Hopes to Browne, no run first positive shot he's played, driving the fuller ball to mid-off
Clarke to Chanderpaul, no run low and flat on about off stump, turned away to midwicket
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run some more air now and he on-drives past the nonstriker
Clarke to Browne, no run some turn and loop, pitching wide of off and spinning away
Clarke to Pollard, no run comes out first ball and tries to defend, misses by some ways and ball clips pad but the appeal is turned down because he was way forward
Hopes to Sammy, no run fullish and moving away outside, and he leaves that one alone

Hopes to Sammy, no run misses a cut, cramped for room and feet not moving, as the ball jags back in .. I'm at a loss for words as to why the West Indians are flashing shots two balls into their time at the crease
Hopes to Sammy, no run leaves this one, which comes back in from wide of the crease
Hopes to Sammy, no run short of a length and now Sammy gets in line to defend it back
Hopes to Sammy, no run comes forward, thinking about playing, but sees the length and leaves
Hopes to Sammy, no run Hopes works that same channel and Sammy opts to leave again
Clarke to Chanderpaul, no run full and flat on off stump, driven back to Clarke's left side
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 2 runs some loop now, it dips, lands and Chanders edges past Ronchi
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run back to flat on middle and leg and he drives to long-on
Clarke to Sammy, 1 run fired in down the legs, Sammy makes room and drives to mid-off
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run full and flat outside off stump, Chanders flicks to midwicket
Clarke to Sammy, no run drifts into his him and he's squared up, getting a leading-edge to point
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run runs first up with an easy dab down past gully to third man
Bracken to Sammy, 1 run change of pace, fullish outside off stump, Sammy makes room and is nearly beaten by the slowness but ends up chopping the ball towards point

Bracken to Chanderpaul, 2 runs shouts of catch it as Chanderpaul clips the slower ball in the air down towards long-on, where Hopes runs around and ends up copping the ball where it hurts, after it drops just in front of him, he makes sure to return it before attending to his injured area ... thats going to knock the wind out of him
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run back of a length outside off stump and he leaves this one be
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run tries to cut a short one but mistimes the shot to Clarke at point
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run slower, wider, fuller, and he prods it into the covers for one
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run flat on middle and off and he turns it to Ponting at midwicket
Clarke to Sammy, no run thinks about hammering it away but defends back to Clarke
Clarke to Sammy, no run fractionally short and he thinks now about cutting, but resists
Clarke to Sammy, no run full and flat and he mistimes a booming drive to cover
Clarke to Sammy, 1 run ends up all cramped for room, shuffling around, inside-edges to leg
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run short and he gets on top, cutting backward of point to keep strike
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run fullish on about off stump, casually clipped to midwicket
Bracken to Sammy, no run holds back the length, slants it across, and Sammy is beaten
Bracken to Sammy, no run again he shapes to heave it but cannot judge the length and in the end has to play some weird sort of back-foot defensive to point
Bracken to Sammy, 1 run fuller length on the stumps, Sammy opens the face and nudges to cover
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 leg bye gets well across and cannot get bat on ball, sliding down leg, but runs a leg bye as the fielder is deep at square leg
Bracken to Sammy, 1 run now he connects on what he's been aiming at for a while, backing away and scooping over the infield and the ball drops short of deep mid-off
Clarke to Sammy, no run full and flat and he drives inside-out to the man at cover
Clarke to Sammy, no run bit shorter, he gets back and cuts to point
Clarke to Sammy, no run comes forward and drives this one back and Clarke fields
Clarke to Sammy, FOUR runs now thats hit out of the screws, simply thumped back over Clarke's head as he lands that ball on a length, where Sammy wants it
Clarke to Sammy, no run swings again and inside-edges towards cover that time
Bracken to Powell, 1 run walks into this shot, timing a drive well past cover to open his account
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run comes forward and is beaten for pace, driving back to Bracken
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run slower ball on a short length, this time Chanders picks it and opens the face of the bat to steer with the width down to third man
Bracken to Powell, no run comes down, Bracken bowls a full toss and its patted back
Bracken to Powell, 1 run clears his front leg and drills a length ball uppishly to long-off
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run full on about off stump and he lazily clips it past midwicket
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 2 runs drops it short and he pulls past square leg out to a diving sweeper, looks likes Hopes out there, well stopped
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run this one's full and flat on middle and leg and he sweeps
Clarke to Powell, 1 run that lands on a length and Powell drives pleasingly towards cover
Clarke to Chanderpaul, 1 run wrong line and thats driven towards midwicket this time
Clarke to Powell, SIX runs top shot, just clearing the front foot and teeing off very hard for a straight six, and that needs to be recovered from between the seats down there
Clarke to Powell, no run quicker, flatter, shorter and he limply defends from his crease
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run drivable length and Chanderpaul does so, out past extra cover
Hopes to Powell, 1 run lands on a length and Powell, making room, clubs it back past Hopes and Chanderpaul for a single towards mid-on
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run reaches across and swings this over midwicket, on the bounce
Hopes to Powell, SIX runs oh he's hit that off the middle, has Powell, just walking down and knocking that rows back over midwicket for half a dozen
Hopes to Powell, 1 run low full toss this time, Powell steps aside and drives past cover
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run full and wide, he reaches out and steers past backward point for a single that raises the West Indies' 100 in 34 overs
Watson to Chanderpaul, 1 run loosener to start off with, slow and loopy outside leg stump, and Chanders turns that into the gap at square leg and midwicket
Watson to Powell, no run dances down, making room, but can't hit the slower ball
Watson to Powell, FOUR runs thats another good shot, Powell walking across his stumps to make sure he's inside the line of the slower ball before paddle-pulling past Lee at short fine leg
Watson to Benn, FOUR runs runs first up, as Benn slashes the slower ball just over gully
Watson to Benn, 1 run dances down and heaves, agriculturally inside-edging down to fine leg where a dive saves runs
Hopes to Benn, 2 runs another decent shot, Benn turning this one past square leg for two
Hopes to Benn, no run makes room, skips down, closes his eyes, swings, and misses
Hopes to Benn, no run how did that miss? Benn swings across the line, the ball is fuller and narrowly misses leg stump after brushing his pads, and then the big man nearly collapses
Hopes to Benn, no run massive slog again, missing by miles, Chanders strolls down for a chat

Hopes to Benn, no run he's not listening to a word his senior team-mate has to say! Benn! He's just going for broke, swinging wildly and missing, again he gets a word from Chanderpaul .. is it worth it?
Hopes to Benn, 1 run finally connects, driving a fuller ball down to mid-off for one
Bracken to Benn, 1 run swings across the line, scooping in the air and it drops safely
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 2 runs sweeps from outside off stump, placing it into the gap at square leg and Marsh slides on the ropes after covering plenty of ground, and fires in a throw
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run slower ball swings in, he chips across the line, missing
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 2 runs doesn't get the yorker right and thats driven in the air to long-on
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run slaps that cross-batted from outside off past midwicket
Bracken to Benn, 1 run again Benn skips down and toe-ends the wide ball towards cover
Lee to Benn, no run lands it on a length, Benn swings and misses once again
Lee to Benn, 1 run swings again, this time getting bat and dripping to to square leg
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run short of a length on off stump, Chanders defends and sets off
Lee to Benn, no run skips down the track, exposing the sticks, Lee follows him with a half-tracker and Benn, taking his eyes off the ball, swats and connects with air
Lee to Benn, 2 runs much fuller, almost a yorker, somehow thats inside-edged to fine leg
Lee to Benn, 1 run fast and very full outside leg, Benn backs away and again gets a thick inside-edge down to the man at fine leg, so Lee stays on 299 wickets for now
Bracken to Benn, FOUR runs there's a boundary, as Benn swats a full toss between midwicket and mid-on, Ponting dives on the ropes and can't stop the four, kicking the ground in disgust
Bracken to Benn, 1 run slower ball, again he swings it away and this time there's protection
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run swings across the line, slogging towards midwicket for one
Bracken to Benn, 1 run skips down, swings, top-edges a slower ball miles up in the air but it drops smack between long-on and long-off converging down there
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run full and wide, Chanders slices the ball towards point for one
Bracken to Benn, no run and again ... you know the drill ... slower ball, full and not that wide, big back-swing, eyes shut, mentally imagining deep midwicket, massive heave, and a miss
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run single now, tucked away from middle and leg to fine leg
Lee to Benn, 1 run backs away, slogs this one down to mid-on, again it drops safely
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 leg bye he too slogs and scoops into the gap at square leg for one
Lee to Benn, no run makes room and drives hard, but cant beat the men at cover
Lee to Benn, 1 run slices this one off the back foot just over backward point
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run full on the stumps and he flicks this out to deep midwicket
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run short of a length, he gets back and runs it to backward point
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run slower and fuller, driven back to Bracken, who sticks out his left hand and ricochets onto the stumps, then Chanderpaul calls for the single
Bracken to Benn, no run fullish outside off, he tries to tip and run but Bracken fields it
Bracken to Benn, no run slow, full, wide, Benn reaches out and drives to cover
Bracken to Benn, no run digs in the short one and Benn loses sight, swerving away
Bracken to Benn, 1 run finishes the match with a slogged single out to deep midwicket
Thats it from Brydon, scorer Raju and myself tonight. Do come back and see us for game three on June 29 at 09:30 local, 13:30 GMT. This is Jamie Alter signing off. Cheers!
Clarke is the Man of the Match for his half-century and three wickets.

18:00pm Australia win by 63 runs (D/L method) and go 2-0 up in the five-game series. West Indies were never in the chase after Lee struck first ball and Gayle went soon after, triggering a spate of silly shots. Chasing 213 wasn't easy on this tough track but West Indies really blew it. Chanderpaul notches up another unbeaten score, this time 45 off 77 balls. Injuries didn't help Wes
Australia won by 63 runs (D/L method)
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
